Detailed Description

topology of the whole system

The Topology class stores the topology of the system like the beads, bonds, molecules and residues.

Todo:
internal management for ids and indices

Definition at line 70 of file topology.cc.

void votca::csg::Topology::CreateMoleculesByResidue (  ) 

create molecules based on the residue

This function scans the topology and creates molecules based on the resiude id. All beads with the same resid are put int one molecule.

Todo:
clean up CreateMoleculesByResidue!

Todo:
sort beads in molecules that all beads are stored in the same order. This is needed for the mapping!
